q1.question: Is it safe to rent my car to a stranger?
q1.answer: Absolutely! All users are verified with ID, selfie and background checks. We also include mandatory insurance, digital checklist when delivering/returning the car, and 24/7 support. Your car is protected.

q2.question: How much do I earn if I rent my car?
q2.answer: Income depends on the rate you set per hour, day or week. Moveo shows you an estimated earnings before publishing your vehicle, and you will receive payment automatically after each rental.

q3.question: What happens if the car is damaged?
q3.answer: Moveo offers protection for both owner and tenant. If any damage occurs, follow our reporting protocol within 24 hours and the support team will guide you through the claims and coverage process.

q1.question: How do I register my vehicle?
q1.answer: Enter your car details (make, model, year), upload photos and set availability. The entire process is completed in minutes.

q2.question: How do I receive rental payments?
q2.answer: Payments are automatically processed to your registered bank account after each completed rental.

q3.question: What should I do if a tenant doesn't take care of my car?
q3.answer: Moveo has an evaluation and reporting system. Report any incident within 24 hours and our team will manage support and possible compensation.

q1.question: How do I search for a car?
q1.answer: Use filters by location, vehicle type and availability to find the car that best suits your trip.

q2.question: Do I have to meet the owner in person?
q2.answer: It's not necessary. The messaging system allows you to coordinate everything without face-to-face contact.

q3.question: What happens if I need to cancel a reservation?
q3.answer: You can cancel following Moveo's policies depending on the vehicle type and selected rate. Refund is processed automatically if applicable.
